text: Ofa gamir gumazibar otariba, 3plan azeniba ikɨtɨ, me men ziaba isɨva ikɨzibar ziabar apengan da osiram. Egh me daghebar anɨngamin dughiamɨn, me ziar kabar ganɨva, dagheba me danɨngam. Egh Godɨn ofa gamir gumazitamɨn ikɨzim mangɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ingaramin dughiam otoghtɨ, me Jerusalemɨn mangegh ingartɨ, me ua men nguibamɨn me bagh daghebar arɨghan kogham.31:16 Hibrun akam deragha akar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
